text: Aur jab inn kay samney humari aayaten parhi jati hain jo bilkul saaf saaf hain to yeh log jin ko humaray pass aaney ki umeed nahi hai yun kehtay hain kay iss kay siwa koi doosra quran layiye ya iss mein kuch tarmeem ker dijiye. Aap keh dijiye kay mujhay yeh haq nahi kay mein apni taraf say iss mein tarmeem kerdoon bus mein to issi ki ittabaa keroon ga jo meray pass wahee kay zariye say phoncha hai agar mein apney rab ki na farmani keroon to mein aik baray din kay azab ka andesha rakhta hun
